summary: Charles Dexter Ward's wife enlists the help of a private detective to find out what her husband is up to in a remote cabin owned by his family for centuries.

keywords: psychotronic film|remake|based on the works of h.p. lovecraft|two word title|body horror
title: The Resurrected
